content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://sadevbrdatalakemalwee.dfs.core.windows.net/raw', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE raw_data.vtex_orderfull (
	[orderId] varchar(8000),
	[creationDate] varchar(8000),
	[clientName] varchar(8000),
	[items] varchar(8000),
	[totalValue] varchar(8000),
	[paymentNames] varchar(8000),
	[status] varchar(8000),
	[statusDescription] varchar(8000),
	[marketPlaceOrderId] varchar(8000),
	[sequence] varchar(8000),
	[salesChannel] varchar(8000),
	[affiliateId] varchar(8000),
	[origin] varchar(8000),
	[workflowInErrorState] varchar(8000),
	[workflowInRetry] varchar(8000),
	[lastMessageUnread] varchar(8000),
	[ShippingEstimatedDate] varchar(8000),
	[ShippingEstimatedDateMax] varchar(8000),
	[ShippingEstimatedDateMin] varchar(8000),
	[orderIsComplete] varchar(8000),
	[listId] varchar(8000),
	[listType] varchar(8000),
	[authorizedDate] varchar(8000),
	[callCenterOperatorName] varchar(8000),
	[totalItems] varchar(8000),
	[currencyCode] varchar(8000),
	[hostname] varchar(8000),
	[invoiceOutput] varchar(8000),
	[invoiceInput] varchar(8000),
	[reportRecordsLimit] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'brazil/vtex/vtex_ordem.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM raw_data.vtex_orderfull
GO
